content: here s an easy beginner friendly crochet top for spring/summer/fall it can be made with two colors or a single color whichever you prefer this pattern includes an 8 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used scheepjes stone washed xl #4 medium weight yarn color a = 841 moon stone color b = 855 green agate crochet hook size 5 mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker notes this crochet pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl for this pattern i used two colors but you can use just one color if you like this crochet pattern is made from the top down in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed color a = 235 260 300 325 365 395 yards color b = 220 230 290 335 390 430 yards gauge blocked 11 5 half_double_crochet x 10 row = 4 measurement xs 33 39 circumference x 16 long s 36 17 circumference x 16 long m 40 34 circumference x 17 20 long l 43 13 circumference x 18 long xl 46 60 circumference x 19 20 long xxl 49 39 circumference x 20 long thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
